OncoFAIR-Consommateur

  • Implementation Guide Version: 0.1.0
  • FHIR Version: 5.0.0
  • Supported Formats: application/fhir+json, application/fhir+ndjson
  • Supported Patch Formats: application/fhir+json
  • Published on: 2024-06-19 15:15:00+0100
  • Published by: DOMASIA team of the Signal and Image Processing Laboratory (LTSI) and KEREVAL

Note to Implementers: FHIR Capabilities

Any FHIR capability may be 'allowed' by the system unless explicitly marked as 'SHALL NOT'. A few items are marked as MAY in the Implementation Guide to highlight their potential relevance to the use case.

FHIR RESTful Capabilities

Mode: client

XXX

Security
Enable CORS: no
Security services supported: OAuth

XXXX

Summary of System-wide Interactions

Capabilities by Resource/Profile

Summary

The summary table lists the resources that are part of this configuration, and for each resource it lists:

  • The relevant profiles (if any)
  • The interactions supported by each resource (Read, Search, Update, and Create, are always shown, while VRead, Patch, Delete, History on Instance, or History on Type are only present if at least one of the resources has support for them.
  • The required, recommended, and some optional search parameters (if any).
  • The linked resources enabled for _include
  • The other resources enabled for _revinclude
  • The operations on the resource (if any)
Resource TypeProfileRSUPCSearches_include_revincludeOperations
Medicationhttp://ltsi.univ-rennes.fr/StructureDefinition/oncofair-medicationyyy_filter, _has, _id, code, medication-type
MedicationRequesthttp://ltsi.univ-rennes.fr/StructureDefinition/oncofair-medicationrequest-prescription
Additional supported profiles:
  OncoFAIR MedicationRequest Element		yyymr-prescription-validation-date, identifier, identifier, mr-type-elementprescription

Resource Conformance: supported Medication

Base System Profile
http://ltsi.univ-rennes.fr/StructureDefinition/oncofair-medication
Profile Conformance
SHALL
Reference Policy

Interaction summary
  • Supports search-type, read, patch.

Search Parameters
ConformanceParameterTypeDocumentation
SHALL_filterspecial

Paramètre de recherche de filtre qui prend en charge une grammaire de recherche plus sophistiquée. Voir la documentation pour plus de détails

SHALL_hasspecial

Permet la sélection des ressources en fonction des propriétés des ressources qui y font référence (reverse chaining)

SHALL_idtoken

Identifiant logique de la ressource

SHALLcodetoken

Identifies the prescribed component according to a nomenclature depending on the type

SHALLmedication-typetoken

Specifies whether the component prescribed is a speciality, a common name or any other product (pharmacopoeia).

 

Resource Conformance: supported MedicationRequest

Base System Profile
http://ltsi.univ-rennes.fr/StructureDefinition/oncofair-medicationrequest-prescription
Profile Conformance
SHALL
Reference Policy

Supported Profiles

http://ltsi.univ-rennes.fr/StructureDefinition/oncofair-medicationrequest-element

Interaction summary
  • Supports search-type, read, patch.

Search Parameters
ConformanceParameterTypeDocumentation
SHALLmr-prescription-validation-datedate

Date and time at which the prescriber considered the prescription validated

SHALLidentifiertoken

Unique prescription identifier

SHALLidentifiertoken

Unique identifier of the prescription item by the prescriber

SHALLmr-type-elementprescriptiontoken

Type of prescription element

interaction.documentation: Only 'top-level' attributes can be updated using patch interaction.

searchParam.name: _filter
searchParam.documentation: Paramètre de recherche de filtre qui prend en charge une grammaire de recherche plus sophistiquée. Voir la [documentation](https://hl7.org/fhir/search_filter.html) pour plus de détails

searchParam.name: _has
searchParam.documentation: Permet la sélection des ressources en fonction des propriétés des ressources qui y font référence (reverse chaining)

searchParam.name: code
searchParam.documentation: Identifies the prescribed component according to a nomenclature depending on the type

searchParam.name: medication-type
searchParam.documentation: Specifies whether the component prescribed is a speciality, a common name or any other product (pharmacopoeia).

interaction.documentation: Only 'top-level' attributes can be updated using patch interaction.

searchParam.name: mr-prescription-validation-date
searchParam.documentation: Date and time at which the prescriber considered the prescription validated

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: Unique identifier of the prescription item by the prescriber
